downloadTitle: Deploying Microsoft Dynamics CRM in Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines
downloadDescription: This white paper is for architects and system administrators who plan to take advantage of Azure Virtual Machines to deploy Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
detailsSection: Running Dynamics CRM in Azure Virtual Machines gives organizations greater access and control to CRM adminstrators, and allows offloading of the machine infrastructure that on-premises customers would otherwise have to invest in. This white paper describes architectures and guidelines for various deployment sizes of Microsoft Dynamics CRM in Azure Virtual Machines.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download link to download this document.

relatedResourcesSection.title: deploy Microsoft Dynamics CRM on Azure FAQ
